programme.title: My Wonderful Life - EP 80
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) A vegetable seller who barely makes ends meet, Pu Fuxi has learned to work hard throughout her life. Navigating her way through an adulterous husband and unhelpful relatives, she struggles to keep her children fed and educated until she receives the opportunity to work for the Shinsang Group as a housekeeper. My Wonderful Life follows the drama that ensues as Fuxi and her employers make realisations that would change her future forever.

programme.title: The Secret House - EP 31

programme.title: Walau Bukan Jodoh Udah Sambungin Aja

programme.title: MOVIE - Konjam Ishtam Konjam Kashtam - EP 1
programme.desc: Siddhu always wears a smile on his face but he has sad past. Geeta joins his college. Both fall in love and are ready to get married. But Geeta's father refuses their love unless Siddhu tackle his Past problem.

programme.title: MOVIE - Nagarvalam - EP 1
programme.desc: The driver of a Metro water lorry and a girl in the locality he supplies water to fall in love. But will the girl's family, which has powerful connections, agree to this match?

programme.title: MOVIE - Thodraa - EP 1
programme.desc: Divya, a wealthy young woman, wants to marry Shankar, a lower-middle-class guy. After eloping, she faces challenges seeking her family's acceptance of their unconventional love.

programme.title: Movie - Rummy - EP 1
programme.desc: College students, Shakthi and Josesh, fall in love with girls of the same family. When the family learns about the love affairs, they are ready to go to any length to save their honour.

programme.title: Movie - Krack - EP 1
programme.desc: Three criminals clash with fiery police officer Potharaju Shankar, unaware they'll face imprisonment in their battle.

programme.title: Movie - Biscoth - EP 1
programme.desc: The story revolves around 3 generations where the three individuals played by Santhanam and they have no relation to each other. The mysteries and correction of mistakes in the past forms the story.

programme.title: Movie - Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu - EP 1
programme.desc: Aravind (Bharath) loses his girl friend Liyana (Mirthika) in a car accident and he lives with her memories. But, people around him try to make him believe that he is just hallucinating and no such person existed. The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

programme.title: Movie - Ponnumani - EP 1
programme.desc: Chinatamani and Ponnumani are in love with each other since childhood but their dreams of a happy life together are shattered when Chinatamani is raped while studying abroad and returns mentally disturbed.

programme.title: Movie - Kuttram 23 - EP 1
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Movie - Dhanusu Raasi Neyargalae - EP 1
programme.desc: A young man battles stringent horoscope rules while seeking a compatible bride, navigating challenges to secure love without conflict and fulfill his family's expectations.

programme.title: Movie - Maapla Singam - EP 1
programme.desc: A leader's daughter falls in love with a boy from the rival caste. Things take a turn when her cousin Anbu falls in love with the boy's sister.

programme.title: Movie - Mirchi Masala - EP 1
programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: Movie - Vadacurry - EP 1
programme.desc: Sathish, who is ashamed of his cheap phone, gives in to temptation when he finds one lying unattended in a shop and steals it. Unfortunately for him, the phone belongs to someone dangerous.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Kanniyum Moondru Kalavanigalum - EP 1
programme.desc: Lord Shiva illustrates to Tamil the significance of time in one's life by narrating a scenario where his girlfriend is kidnapped at different time intervals.

programme.title: Movie - Amigoes - EP 1
programme.desc: Three nearly-identical men become fast friends after meeting via an online doppelgänger-finding app. It's all fun and games until one of them turns out to be a notorious fugitive.

programme.title: Movie - Captain - EP 1
programme.desc: Gangster Soori, known as Captain, aids people in need. Meeting Nisha brings transformative love. Will his past hinder a new beginning?

programme.title: Movie - Thalaivi - EP 1
programme.desc: J Jayalalithaa, a prolific actress, is encouraged by her mentor, M G Ramachandran, to join politics. However, she faces a difficult challenge in the form of a male-dominated political environment.

programme.title: Movie - Vallamai Tharayao - EP 1
programme.desc: The sensitive portrayal of a woman torn between her relationships, feelings and desires.

programme.title: Movie - Bhairavakottai - EP 1
programme.desc: Basava and John, in a heist gone wrong, stumble upon mysteries in Bhairavakona, unraveling its secrets with Geetha's help.

programme.title: Movie - Saaho - EP 1
programme.desc: An undercover agent and his partner pursue a thief who stole 2,000 crore rupees, only to discover the case is connected to a crime lord's death and a brewing gang war.

programme.title: Movie - Kadugu - EP 1
programme.desc: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child.

programme.title: Drole De Drame
programme.desc: When invited to his cousin Irwin Moyneux's house Archibald Soper, Bishop of Bedford, rigorously denounces the novels of successful author Felix Chapel. He doesn't know that in reality behind the pseudonym hides... his host! Intrigued by the absence of Margaret, Irwin's wife, he deduces that she has been assassinated.

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.title: Titon Et L'aurore
programme.desc: In ancient Greece, the story of the tumultuous love affair between Aurora, a young fugitive goddess, and the shepherd Titon. The god Aeolus is jealous. Pales, rejected by the young man, seeks revenge by aging him prematurely. But Aurora swears that she will be forever faithful to him...

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Seychelles, Un Paradis Ecologique
programme.desc: Their name alone seems to open the doors to paradise: the Seychelles. With the breathtaking beauty of their ocean floor, bird sanctuaries and major nature reserves, the archipelago in the Indian Ocean has made environmental protection a national duty. The Seychelles are pioneers in the world of ecotourism.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: La Baie De La Grande Maree
programme.desc: Mont-Saint-Michel Bay is home to Europe's largest tidal range. With a difference of up to fifteen metres between low and high tide, the phenomenon causes an incredible mixing of life. From microfauna to apex predators, during a particularly low tide, we join local enthusiasts to explore this unique ecosystem.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 17
programme.desc: Rising sea-levels are one of the consequences of climate change that will change the map of the world. Different countries are trying to adapt, using varied strategies. From Shanghai to Tuvalu, from megacities to tiny islands, we visit some of the most vulnerable coastlines and the solutions they have invented.

programme.title: Tuamotu Sauvages - EP 1
programme.desc: South of the Fakarava atoll, the Tetamanu Channel is at the height of its activity. It's winter in the southern hemisphere and full moon, underwater, the celestial body governs biological cycles. Between dusk and dawn, the fates of innumerable species are played out in this delicately balanced environment.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 52
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Juste Une Mise Au Point - EP 9
programme.desc: Actress, author, director and stage director, Zabou Breitman made a name for herself as a unique figure in the world of French film, notably with ''Se Souvenir de Belles Choses''. She looks back at her wide-ranging experience and her long career.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 7
programme.desc: Before becoming a painter Pierre Sojo had a passion for drawing as an art in its own right. Today his drawings also serve as preparatory sketches prior to his painting.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 4
programme.desc: Off Finistere, in Morlaix bay, the Isle of Callot is well known to hikers and tourists. Cut off from the world, it is only accessible by foot twice a day. At high tide, there are only a handful of inhabitants who love their land. Portraits.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 11
programme.desc: Julien heads off to meet Audrey and Michael, who settled in the Yukon in an off-grid yurt with their three young children. He discovers the family's daily routine, a life filled with challenges and all the ingenuity necessary to overcome them.

programme.title: Resistances - EP 2
programme.desc: After Hitler's invasion of the USSR in June 1941, the communist party begins its armed struggle. In August, Colonel Fabien, head of the Special Organisation, executes a Nazi officer at the Barbes metro station in Paris. The retaliation is immediate and terrible: hostages such as Guy Moquet are shot.

programme.title: L'instant Roland-Garros
programme.desc: The daily roundup with full results, the best discussions and not-to-be missed highlights.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 20
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 18
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot makes grilled tuna with grated papaya salad.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 11
programme.desc: Julien heads off to meet Audrey and Michael, who settled in the Yukon in an off-grid yurt with their three young children. He discovers the family's daily routine, a life filled with challenges and all the ingenuity necessary to overcome them.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 4
programme.desc: Off Finistere, in Morlaix bay, the Isle of Callot is well known to hikers and tourists. Cut off from the world, it is only accessible by foot twice a day. At high tide, there are only a handful of inhabitants who love their land. Portraits.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 80
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 42
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 18
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 2
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Mystery Lane - EP 18
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 18
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot makes grilled tuna with grated papaya salad.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Adamo, Le Film De Sa Vie
programme.desc: In a journey full of intimacy and surprises, the life of Salvatore Adamo is recounted by seventeen of his fans. In the company of Bruno Tummers and Joelle Scoriels, seated in the front row of the Theatre royal de Mons, the artist relives the highlights of his career, projected on the big screen.

programme.title: Abers Road - EP 1
programme.desc: Direction Nantes, to meet Dominique A. The artist, who spent his teenage years in the city, welcomes Gaetan Roussel in front of the castle of the Dukes of Brittany and then takes him on a walking tour of the historic town centre. Then, they head for Langon, in Ille-et-Vilaine.

programme.title: L'ocean Vu Du Coeur
programme.desc: Surrounded by experts, scientists, explorers, or simple fishermen, the astrophysicist and ecologist Hubert Reeves, who passed away in 2023, proposes to identify what threatens the ocean today and exposes the latest discoveries on the intelligence of animals and ocean ecosystems.

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: Behind the steering wheel of a car, a young boy holds back his tears and his breath while a female voice speaks to him on the telephone. Based on a true story, the last 48 hours of the life of Marc-Antoine, aged 14, confronted by his urgent need for freedom.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 16
programme.desc: Caroline and Sebastien refuse to give up and are determined to identify the person who hired a private detective to find them. Lise tries to warn Anemone about Vincent, convinced that he is continuing to dig into her past.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 17
programme.desc: An accident at Sophie's forces Anemone to enter the home of the ''praying mantis''. What she discovers comes as a veritable shock. Still shaken by the surprise that awaited her the last time she visited her ex's home, Caroline opens up to Sebastien.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 23
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Resistances - EP 1
programme.desc: Summer 1940, France is defeated. Many refuse the capitulation, but the vast majority of French fall into line behind Marshal Petain, who requested the armistice. 18 June; the call to resist from an unknown general, Charles de Gaulle, persuades Jeanne Bohec, Daniel Cordier and Gilbert Renault to head for London.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 846
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 22
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Partis Rouler - EP 7
programme.desc: Alexis is exploring his adventurous side and is getting ready for a two-day bikepacking trip, led by Simon Bergeron and Marie-Pierre Savard, two adventure biking enthusiasts.

programme.title: Abers Road - EP 1
programme.desc: Direction Nantes, to meet Dominique A. The artist, who spent his teenage years in the city, welcomes Gaetan Roussel in front of the castle of the Dukes of Brittany and then takes him on a walking tour of the historic town centre. Then, they head for Langon, in Ille-et-Vilaine.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 21
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette - EP 4
programme.desc: On the menu: veal blanquette with tonka beans. Today's discovery: 100% local, traditional, additive-free beef jerky.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Partis Rouler - EP 7
programme.desc: Alexis is exploring his adventurous side and is getting ready for a two-day bikepacking trip, led by Simon Bergeron and Marie-Pierre Savard, two adventure biking enthusiasts.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 22
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 81
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 43
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 19
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 3
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Mystery Lane - EP 19
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette - EP 4
programme.desc: On the menu: veal blanquette with tonka beans. Today's discovery: 100% local, traditional, additive-free beef jerky.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Une Pierre Dans La Bouche
programme.desc: Injured, exhausted and on the run from two killers, an American gangster finds refuge in an isolated and apparently uninhabited manor. He soon discovers that it's actually occupied by a former actor, blind but with particularly keen instincts. One day the fugitive's nephew suddenly arrives, accompanied by his girlfriend...

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 7
programme.desc: Cecil Bazin, zoo director, is found dead in the cheetah enclosure. Despite the bite marks, it wasn't a cheetah that killed her. Had someone wanted to make it look like an accident by letting one of the big cats into the enclosure when it should have spent the night indoors?

programme.title: Tandem - EP 8
programme.desc: Fishermen surprise Julien, Alice's boyfriend, cleaning-up a crime scene at the port. Everything points to him as the one who killed his friend Mickael. Lea tries desperately to get Julien to explain, but he refuses to say anything. Why would he have attacked someone he considered as a brother?

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Nievevska Torres is a world school chess champion. As she climbs the ranks, her father battles cancer - drawing strength from her victories. Together, they face life’s challenges one move at a time.

programme.title: Movie - Idhaya thirudan
programme.desc: A young woman posts her pictures online and emails them to a fictitious address; to her surprise, a person actually exists at the address. They meet and eventually fall in love, but a police officer poses trouble because he is interested in the girl.

programme.title: Movie - Tamil Selvanum Thaniyar Anjalum
programme.desc: When Tamilselvan, a courier boy, witnesses an assault on a social activist who he had to deliver a package to, he learns that it contains the evidence to a racket wherein doctors abort foetuses through a pill.

programme.title: Movie - En Purushan Ethir Veetu Ponnu
programme.desc: Pandi is happily married to his uncle's daughter. But misunderstandings creep into their relationship when his wife suspects him of having an affair.

programme.title: Movie - Paattondru Ketten
programme.desc: Sneha, an orphan, leads a happy life after marrying Anandh. However, her past relationship with a smuggler comes back to haunt her and threatens to ruin her marriage.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kannal Pesava
programme.desc: A popular music director begins recollecting his past when a film director comes to explain to him about a song situation. He falls for a singer who ignores him at first, but then starts loving him back.

programme.title: Movie - Gokulam
programme.desc: Chellappa, who owns a photo studio, falls in love with Mary, who has recently come to stay in his locality. His dreams shatter when she reveals the secrets of her past.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Sivappu Manithan
programme.desc: Vijay, a Tamil professor, is in love with Uma, a lawyer. Along with Ravi, he fights to put an end to prostitution and the production of illicit liquor in their locality.

programme.title: Movie - Andha 7 Naatkal
programme.desc: When Vasanthi's husband, Dr Anand, learns that she was forcefully married to him, he decides to reunite her with her lover. However, Vasanthi soon falls for him and accepts him as her husband.

programme.title: Movie - Natpe Thunai
programme.desc: Prabhakaran, a former hockey player, helps a local team save their ground by training them to win a match against the Pondicherry team. However, a corrupt politician has his eyes set on the ground.

programme.title: Movie - Vattaram
programme.desc: A man has nursed the ambition to become a don like his idol. He bids his time until he gets a chance to join his idol's gang and quickly becomes an important henchman. He is trusted against the warnings of his lieutenant.

programme.title: Movie - Galatta Ganapathy
programme.desc: A man gets married to a woman but when he brings her home, his mother demands dowry from her. Things take a turn when he learns that she is a sub-inspector.

programme.title: Movie - Padhavi Paduthum Paadu
programme.desc: A political satire based on a forest bandit and a sandalwood smuggler with a difference. The bandit gets amnesty and enters politics to clean up the corrupt system.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Maharaja
programme.desc: Bored by his monotonous lifestyle, Mahadevan, a middle-aged family man, longs to live a modern life. However, everything begins to fall apart when he chooses to change his way of living.

programme.title: Movie - Subash
programme.desc: In order to marry the girl he loves, Subash, a good-for-nothing youth, joins the army. When he returns, he learns that his own brother is using corrupt ways to gain power in politics.

programme.title: Movie - Enn Purusan Kuzhantai Mathuri
programme.desc: A man gets involved with another woman just a day before he is to get married. After marriage, he lands in trouble when he confesses his mistake to his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Mahanadhi
programme.desc: Krishnaswamy, an honest man, is conned into a chit fund business and imprisoned. While he faces unspeakable hardships in prison, his family disintegrates.

programme.title: Movie - Kaththi Sandai
programme.desc: Arjun plays modern-day Robin Hood when he steals money from two corrupt government officials and uses it to develop the remote village he hails from.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Canadian Open is a professional golf tournament in Canada. It is co-organized by Golf Canada and the PGA Tour. It was first played 121 years ago in 1904, and has been held annually since then, except for during World War I, World War II and the COVID-19 pandemic. It is the third oldest continuously running tournament on the tour, after The Open Championship and the U.S. Open.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-19 (Ronnie O'Sullivan vs Pang Junxu)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We talk to the cast of characters who helped Blackpool reach the dizzy heights of the Premier League in the 2010-11 season. With some hilarious anecdotes and unexpected tales, we hear from the team of lower league misfits, led by the charismatic Ian Holloway on how they fought against all the odds and so nearly confounded their critics.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 10/11
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 13
programme.desc: One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League champion and Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: Tony Pulis looks back on his most memorable moments at the helm of Stoke City, including the Potters' first-ever appearance in the Premier League in the 2008/09 season.

programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 22
programme.desc: After a turbulent childhood, including leaving his country of birth due to war, Asmir Begovic's determination led to him to a Premier League winners medal. The 37 year-old goalkeeper talks us through his journey from Bosnia to Everton with many stops in between.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 27
programme.desc: Coming from a successful footballing family, Javier Hernandez was somewhat destined for football stardom. Chicharito talks us through his fairytale move to Manchester United as well as his return to Mexico and his hometown team, Club Deportivo Guadalajara.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 33
programme.desc: PL Stories takes an intimate look at the controversial and charismatic career of Nicklas Bendtner, exploring his rise to fame and the challenges that came with it. We follow Bendtner's journey from Premier League star to returning to his hometown in Denmark, where he reflects on his highs, lows, and the impact of his larger-than-life persona.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 35
programme.desc: PL Stories follows the journey of Andy Carroll, from his high-flying Premier League career to his new chapter in Bordeaux. The documentary captures Carroll's resilience as he navigates the challenges of his football career, reflecting on the ups and downs along the way. We join him in Bordeaux, where he looks back on his past, his passion for the game, and his drive to prove himself once again

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 5
programme.desc: Premier League legend Tim Howard takes on the ultimate challenge, ranking the 10 greatest US players to play in the Premier League. But there's a twist; from his carefully selected list, he must crown one as the Ultimate Premier League USA GOAT.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: Reggae Rhythms in the Premier League explores the powerful connection between Jamaica and the world's most-watched football league, showcasing how the island's culture, music, and style have influenced the Premier League. We feature iconic Jamaican players who have left their mark, while also diving into the impact of reggae music, fashion, and fan culture on the game.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 20
programme.desc: PL Stories looks into the extraordinary journey of Emmanuel Adebayor, from his prolific Premier League career with Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, and Crystal Palace, to the harrowing experience of surviving the Togo bus attack in 2010. We dive deep into his rise as one of Africa's finest football talents, and how the near-death tragedy profoundly impacted his life, shaping his resilience and outlook beyond the game.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We delve into the careers of some of the most enigmatic and unpredictable footballers to have graced the English top-flight in recent years and find out how they became 'Premier League mavericks'. We get under the skin of what made these players notorious, controversial and flamboyant and the impact they had in their time in England.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 20
programme.desc: This week's Big Interview sees two of Chelsea's biggest stars from different generations come together for a football masterclass. Considered one of the most technically gifted players the Premier League has ever seen, Gianfranco Zola visits the Chelsea training ground to talk to the man currently lighting up the Premier League, Cole Palmer, about various aspects of his game.

programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2024/25 in a Premier League season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 50
programme.desc: We follow New Zealand striker Chris Wood during a crucial World Cup Qualifier on home soil, at the peak of one of the most impressive seasons of his career. Back in his hometown, we meet the family, coaches and friends who helped shape the player and the person he's become. From humble beginnings to Premier League mainstay, Wood reflects on the pressures he's faced, the pride of leading his country, and the mindset that's driven him every step of the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode features part 1 of all the highlights from BodogFIGHT season two showing recaps and highlights of all the MMA scraps that took place in St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 5: Marseille, France - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Savate and the Martial Art of Hands and Feet with Masters Christian Robert, Frank May, Frederic Baret, Laurent Bois and Patrick Gellat.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Kotoshoho, Shodai, Takayasu and Takanosho.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Okinoumi, Hoshoryu and Onosho.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. defeating Juan Manuel Marquez for career win No. 40, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Tbilisi, Georgia, where judo is one of the most popular sports in the country.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 61
programme.desc: The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing the Best Friend Song with their school friends.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are riding around an amazing bicycle trail. But when Phoebe worries that she might fall off her new bike, will she complete the trail with her friends?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: Pug needs a story about how to be brave. Dog and Pug meet the great Spanish knight Don Quixote and his partner Sancho Panza. Pug needs saving and Don Quixote defeats the giant windmills.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: It's a grey and rainy day in the real world and Messy can see something amazing outside his window. A beautiful arch of colours magically appears across the sky. He goes to OKIDO to find out more.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Messy monster can't find his caterpillar friends. The garden bush where he left his friends is now covered with pretty butterflies. But where did the caterpillars go? He flutters off to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 76
programme.desc: The Kazoops family get lost in the middle of nowhere, but they soon discover a change of scenery can be as good as a holiday.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 7
programme.desc: While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Hannah is making a delicious marinade for salmon with soy sauce and Korean chilli paste.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rainforests of Borneo in South-East Asia in search of an orangutan mother and her baby.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 21
programme.desc: Seaweed arrives on deck playing a new game called Sandcastle Squish on his console, but Captain Captain takes it off him and quickly becomes obsessed with it, neglecting her captain's duties. It's up to the pirates to try and get her to stop playing the game.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: When the toy shop closes, Krash falls down and gets stuck by a red label with Sold! on it.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Evil Pea takes all the toys in the supermarket for herself and the Cobs to play with. Supertato climbs a big wall of boxes to try and get the toys back.

programme.desc: The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'g', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We rock out on the guitar, meet a goat and score a goal!

programme.desc: When the Cloudship malfunctions and soars off into OKIDO, it's up to Messy and friends to return it to its natural habitat!

programme.desc: Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 7

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 12

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 6

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: PFAS chemicals are used in thousands of products aimed at making life easier. But the chemicals are now almost everywhere, including in human blood, and are being linked to severe health problems.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: K9 Mounties

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S1
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen

Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit S2
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: NHK Amateur Singing Contest "Tsugaru City, Aomori Prefecture" (R)
programme.desc: A very popular live program on a Sunday afternoon held at different towns and cities around Japan. Guest singers will also join in for support.

programme.title: Hotan-Ruoqiang Railway: The World's First Railway Loop in the Taklamakan Desert
programme.desc: In 2020, the world’s first desert loop railway encircling China’s Taklamakan Desert opened, featuring a 24-meter-high viaduct to protect against sandstorms. The railway has transformed life along the Silk Road, with descendants of the Loulan Kingdom and Keriyan people launching new businesses. Buyers are flocking to Hotan, famed for its Kunlun jade. The program captures the desert’s snowy landscape in 4K, offering a journey where history and the present meet.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: SCIENCE ZERO
programme.desc: A scientific information program which explains the latest research, disasters and accidents from scientific aspects with a virtual set in the studio.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 22 (R)
programme.desc: Harumachi, having revealed his intense jealousy toward Masanobu at a banquet held to promote Utamaro's name, still refuses to write despite Tsutaju’s request. In an effort to persuade him, Kisanji and Utamaro pay Harumachi a visit. Meanwhile, Tagasode (Fukuhara Haruka) presses Tanuma Okitomo to redeem her in exchange for her cooperation regarding the Ezochi matter. She then attempts to approach Matsumae Hirotane (Hyouroku) to obtain evidence of the illicit trade.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)
programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Eps. 51
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Empirical Science Variety Show "Choice" (R)
programme.desc: Some scientists challenge human mysteries believed to be unsolvable, such as the red string of fate, supernatural powers, and lies. They are supported by empirical experiments. The entertainment program turns such scientific experiments into dramatic events, exploring human mysteries.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Explore Japanese Roots with the Lost Bone (R)
programme.desc: Last spring, the long-lost bone of the "Yomigahama Man" was rediscovered after half a century. Unearthed in 1969 in Sakaiminato City, it was dated by archaeologist Naora Nobuo to be between 20,000 and 50,000 years old. Though once hailed as Japan’s oldest human remains, it was never accepted by academia and eventually went missing. The relic left behind by Naora, who was admired even by author Matsumoto Seicho, is now in the hands of Kaifu Yosuke and other leading anthropologists in Japan.

programme.title: Reborn Rich - EP 11
programme.desc: Yang Cheol and Do Joon set up a plan to find the mastermind behind their car collision. Hyun Min suspects Sung Joon incited Yang Cheol's accident.

programme.title: Reborn Rich - EP 12
programme.desc: Sung Joon nominates Young Ki to be the financial holding company's CEO. Do Joon makes a deal with Pil Ok to keep Yang Cheol's illness from the family.

programme.title: Reborn Rich - EP 13
programme.desc: Soonyang's car breaks record sales after Do Joon used World Cup to promote it successfully. Do Joon receives nothing from Yang Cheol's last will.

programme.title: Reborn Rich - EP 14
programme.desc: Sung Joon uses Hang Jae to get rid of Do Joon. Dong Ki wants to set up his own financial group and negotiates with Do Joon to buy over Soonyang Card.

programme.title: K-Hits
programme.desc: K-Hits brings you the latest in the K-pop scene.

programme.title: Running Man - EP 733
programme.desc: The must watch for K-Variety shows! In this "urban action variety", the hosts complete a series of obstacles and aim to eliminate each other to win.

programme.title: Desperate Mrs. Seonju - EP 95
programme.desc: Joong Bae demotes Sang Ah, Woo Sang is let down by his mother, and Jin Ju suggests Seon Ju appear on her show.

programme.title: Desperate Mrs. Seonju - EP 96
programme.desc: Jin Ju is torn, and Seon Ju rescues Tae Ri. Meanwhile, Joong Bae nearly uncovers the truth.

programme.title: Desperate Mrs. Seonju - EP 97
programme.desc: Joong Bae pulls away from Soon Ae, Woo Sang asks Mi Ju to come home, and Seon Ju shows her design.

programme.title: Desperate Mrs. Seonju - EP 98
programme.desc: Tension grows between Seon Ju and Sang Ah, while Nam Jin finds out that Joong Bae is digging into Soon Ae's past.

programme.title: Third Marriage - EP 112
programme.desc: Da Jung warns Secretary Kim not to take the fall for Je Guk's stock manipulation. Se Ran conspires with Sang Cheol to steal Je Guk's hidden gold bars.

programme.title: Third Marriage - EP 113
programme.desc: Sang Cheol and Se Ran are ecstatic to see a room of treasures in Je Guk's hidden warehouse. Je Guk is arrested and interrogated for illegal trading.

programme.title: Taxi Driver - EP 1
programme.desc: Ha Na is assigned to assist Sung Cheol on a support foundation for crime victims. Do Ki reaches out to help an orphan who is abused by her abductors.

programme.title: Taxi Driver - EP 2
programme.desc: Do Ki poses as a buyer to infiltrate the despicable food factory. Sung Cheol and his team punish and take revenge on the villains in Maria's case.

programme.title: Running Man - EP 733
programme.desc: The must watch for K-Variety shows! In this "urban action variety", the hosts complete a series of obstacles and aim to eliminate each other to win.

programme.title: Pretty Ugly - EP 10
programme.desc: Dan Tae begins investigations by getting hired as Soon Chun's secretary. During a board meeting, Dan Tae finds out his drinking water is poisoned.

programme.desc: This drama revolves around Cheung Kit's journey as he grapples with his luxurious lifestyle. Through a series of romantic entanglements and conflicts with friends and family, Kit is forced to confront his own immaturity and the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2573
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 3
programme.desc: The 7 individuals were all involved in the heated case of a missing girl. As they attempt to escape their fate and pursue the truth, they find themselves embroiled in secrets, lies, and desires in this retribution tale.

programme.title: Till The End Of The Moon - EP 6
programme.desc: The story follows Li Su Su (Bai Lu) as she assumes the identity of mortal Ye Xi Wu and travels 500 years ago to stop the demon lord's resurrection. As she journeys, her fate tangles with Tantai Jin (Leo Luo), the lord's captive prince.

programme.title: Till The End Of The Moon - EP 7

programme.title: Truth - EP 25
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.

programme.title: What If - EP 1
programme.desc: Regular girl Xia Guo (Zhong Chu Xi) is faced with a dilemma. Would she choose to live a home-sweet-home life with her boyfriend in her hometown or seize the opportunity to forge a successful career in a big city?

programme.title: What If - EP 2
programme.desc: Regular girl Xia Guo (Zhong Chu Xi) is faced with a dilemma. Would she choose to live a home-sweet-home life with her boyfriend in her hometown or seize the opportunity to forge a successful career in a big city?

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 77
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 22
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1967
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 639
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Battle of Marriage - EP 19
programme.desc: The storyline revolves around the complexities of the entertainment industry and online ecosystems, using a lighthearted yet earnest approach to explore close-to-home issues of "truth cannot be faked, and lies cannot become truth," while depicting the conflicts and lives of a celebrity couple.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 2
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 27
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 5
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai).
